title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect behavior of custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299 - The behavior of custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting is not as described in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1.
OB: The current behavior of the application does not follow the statement in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 about the custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting.
EB: Expected behavior: Following the statement in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1, the Reload link should have the custom cookie name included in the URL.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Access the application at http://localhost:8080/cookiename/
2. Observe the URL of the Reload link
